name: Zona Maco 2026
description: Latin America's leading art fair returns to Mexico City, featuring galleries from around the world presenting modern and contemporary art. Over 200 galleries from 30+ countries.
address: Av. del Conscripto 311, Lomas de Sotelo

name: Material Art Fair 2026
description: Mexico City's art fair dedicated to emerging and mid-career artists. A platform for discovery and new voices in contemporary art.

name: Salón ACME 2026
description: Independent art fair showcasing self-managed galleries, artist-run spaces, and independent projects from Mexico and Latin America.
address: Plaza de la República s/n, Tabacalera

name: Kurimanzutto Gallery Opening
description: Special exhibition opening during Art Week at one of Mexico's most influential contemporary art galleries.
address: Gob. Rafael Rebollar 94, San Miguel Chapultepec

name: OMR Gallery - Art Week Opening
description: Opening reception at OMR, a cornerstone of Mexico City's contemporary art scene since 1983.

name: Museo Tamayo - Extended Hours
description: The Museo Tamayo offers extended evening hours during Art Week with special programming and tours.
address: Paseo de la Reforma 51, Bosque de Chapultepec

name: Museo Jumex - Art Week Exhibition
description: Special exhibition at Mexico's premier private contemporary art museum, featuring works from the Jumex Collection.

name: Labor Gallery Opening
description: New exhibition opening at Labor, known for representing cutting-edge contemporary artists.

name: Proyectos Monclova - Group Show
description: Group exhibition featuring emerging artists during Mexico City Art Week.

name: Casa Luis Barragán - Special Tour
description: Exclusive guided tours of Luis Barragán's UNESCO World Heritage home and studio during Art Week.

name: Collectors' Dinner at Contramar
description: Exclusive dinner for collectors and gallery VIPs at Mexico City's iconic seafood restaurant.

name: Roma Norte Gallery Walk
description: Self-guided walking tour of Roma Norte galleries participating in Art Week. Maps available at participating galleries.

name: Art Week Opening Party
description: The official Art Week CDMX opening party with DJs, performances, and an open bar.

name: Artist Talk: Contemporary Mexican Art
description: Panel discussion with leading Mexican artists on the state of contemporary art in Mexico.
address: Av. del Conscripto 311, Lomas de Sotelo

name: Performance Art Night
description: Evening of live performance art featuring Mexican and international artists.
